snippet.title: Wreckreation | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wreckreation is the home of your very own MixWorld, a 400 square kilometer racing realm that is yours to create, shape – and wreck. 

Developed by Three Fields Entertainment, a team consisting of racing game veterans, Wreckreation was designed to be the ultimate open-world sandbox experience for driving and racing fans alike. A complete world of your own designed by you or together with friends in online coop. 
  
Wreckreation is coming to PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One.

- Links & Info - 
Steam: https://thqn.net/w-steam
Website: https://wreckreation.thqnordic.com
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/wreckreation

- Our Socials - 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/THQNordic 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/THQNordic 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic 

 
#Wreckreation #MixYourWorld #THQNordic2022
